name: homarr
description: A sleek, modern dashboard that puts all of your apps and services at your fingertips. Control everything in one convenient location. Seamlessly integrates with the apps you've added, providing you with valuable information.

paths.name: Appdata
paths.description: Configuration, database and user data for Homarr.

paths.name: Docker Socket
paths.description: Docker socket for monitoring and controlling containers.

ports.name: WebUI Port
ports.description: Web interface port for Homarr dashboard.

variables.name: SECRET_ENCRYPTION_KEY
variables.value: CREATE A NEW ONE WITH COMMAND openssl rand -hex 32
variables.description: Encryption key for securing sensitive data. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32
